section.title: and and but
section.sectiontitle: We use and and but to join two sentences together.
section.text1: I went shopping. I bought a new bag.
section.text1a: I went shopping and I bought a new bag.
section.sectiontitle2: We use but when something is surprising or different.
section.text3: He had a good time. He decided not to go again
section.text3a: He had a good time but he decided not to go again.
